title: My first computer
content: I remember my first computer was a 486DX with 8MB of RAM and a 40MB hard drive. It was a beast of a machine and I loved it.

title: My first mobile phone
content: My first mobile phone was a Nokia 3310. It was a great phone and I loved playing Snake on it.

title: My favorite programming language
content: My favorite programming langue is JavaScript

title: My favorite TV show
content: My favorite tv show is breaking bad
